attributes.action: To launch a independent investigation to why DNACPR notices for disabled people
attributes.additional_details: I want government and Parliament to act to protect  That section of the society   That as no voice
attributes.background: To Launch  independent investigation into why DNACPR notices  are being used on  disabled people and people  with Learning difficulties  in the COVID-19 pandemic  and to Prioritise people with disability’s and leaning disability’s . For the cov-19  vaccine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562740
